calivista.title: About the vineyard
calivista.text: CaliVista is our 70 acre vineyard near Tupungato, Mendoza, Argentina. Located at an altitude over 3,500 feet above sea level, the rocky soils of our land provide excellent drainage allowing high quality vines to thrive.

team.name: David Kalainoff
team.about: David Kalainoff from Iowa was a senior executive at a global insurance company when he first visited Argentina in 2007 in search of a wine-related investment. Shortly thereafter he purchased a 25 hectare vineyard in Mendoza's prestigious Uco Valley. "Although my friends at work thought I was crazy, I knew in my heart that Mendoza was a unique opportunity for me to get into wine and establish myself in an industry with tremendous potential," - says David. This year he began exporting his CaliVista wine to the United States. Dave has a wife Debbie, daughter Tatiana, and son Paulo.
